# SOLUTION

for _ in range(int(input())):
    n, x, y = map(int, input().split())
    arr = [i for i in range(x, y+1)]
    for i in range(n-len(arr)):
        arr.insert(i, arr[i]+1)
    print(*arr)

t = int(input())

for _ in range(t):
    n, x, y = map(int, input().split())
    print(*([x] + [x + (i+1)*(y-x)//n for i in range(n-1)]))
